questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Recycling and waste management

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A recycling initiative
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person
B) A building
C) A recycling bin
D) A tree

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A car
C) A recycling bin
D) A tree

What type of recycling materials are indicated on the bin?
A) Paper and cardboard
B) Plastic and aluminum
C) Glass and metal
D) Organic waste

What color is the recycling bin?
A) Red
B) Green
C) Blue
D) Yellow

What word is written at the top of the recycling bin?
A) Trash
B) Waste
C) Recycle
D) Compost

What is the background of the photo?
A) A park
B) A beach
C) A concrete wall
D) A forest

What is the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) Concrete ground
D) Water

What material is the recycling bin made of?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Plastic
D) Glass

What is the shape of the lid on the recycling bin?
A) Flat
B) Dome-shaped
C) Square
D) Triangular

What does the sign on the recycling bin say?
A) Plastic and glass only
B) Paper and cardboard only
C) Plastic and aluminum only
D) Organic waste only

What structural element is visible behind the recycling bin?
A) A tree
B) A bench
C) A concrete wall
D) A fence

What is the primary message of the photo?
A) Encouraging recycling
B) Promoting nature conservation
C) Advertising a product
D) Showcasing an event

What is the purpose of the recycling bin?
A) To collect general waste
B) To collect recyclable materials
C) To serve as a decoration
D) To store items

What feature is visible on the lid of the recycling bin?
A) A handle
B) A push flap
C) A lock
D) A sensor

What kind of surface is the recycling bin placed on?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) Concrete
D) Wood

What is the dominant color scheme of the photo?
A) Red and yellow
B) Green and brown
C) Blue and gray
D) Black and white

What is the shape of the recycling bin?
A) Square
B) Cylindrical
C) Rectangular
D) Triangular

What is the condition of the ground around the recycling bin?
A) Clean and smooth
B) Dirty and littered
C) Wet and muddy
D) Covered in grass

What is the primary action suggested by the photo?
A) Throwing away trash
B) Recycling plastic and aluminum
C) Planting trees
D) Cleaning up litter

What is the function of the push flap on the recycling bin?
A) To lock the bin
B) To open the lid
C) To deposit recyclables
D) To display information

What additional feature is visible on the recycling bin?
A) A recycling symbol
B) A company logo
C) A map
D) A barcode

What kind of maintenance does the recycling bin appear to need?
A) Cleaning
B) Painting
C) Repair
D) Replacement

What is the primary material used in the construction of the recycling bin?
A) Plastic
B) Metal
C) Wood
D) Glass

What is the purpose of the recycling symbol on the bin?
A) To indicate it is recyclable
B) To indicate it is for recycling
C) To indicate it is made from recycled materials
D) To indicate it is for general waste

What is the likely target audience for the message of the photo?  
A) Everyone  
B) Adults  
C) Elderly  
D) Teenagers

What is the likely impact of the photo on viewers?
A) Encouraging recycling
B) Promoting littering
C) Advertising a brand
D) Encouraging wastefulness

What is the primary focus of the text on the recycling bin?
A) Instructions for use
B) Brand information
C) Recycling materials
D) Contact information

What is the likely response of people seeing the recycling bin?
A) Ignoring it
B) Using it for general waste
C) Using it for recycling
D) Avoiding it

What is the primary message conveyed by the recycling symbol on the bin?
A) Recycle here
B) Trash here
C) Compost here
D) Donate here

What is the overall theme of the photo?
A) Environmental conservation
B) Urban development
C) Historical preservation
D) Cultural celebration

What is the recycling bin labeled for?
A) Paper and cardboard
B) Plastic and aluminum only
C) Glass and metal
D) Organic waste

What action is suggested by the word "PUSH" on the lid?
A) Pull the lid
B) Push the lid open
C) Twist the lid
D) Lift the lid
